newQuestionForm.title: Question Title

description.edit: Configure the general settings for the template.

templateForm.title: Title
templateForm.titlePlaceholder: Enter a title for the template
templateForm.descriptionPlaceholder: Enter a description for the template
templateForm.publicDescription: This will allow any authenticated user to fill your template.

isPublic.yes: This template is public and can be filled by any authenticated user.
isPublic.no: This template is private. Only allowed users can fill it.

deleteToast.title: Form is being deleted
deleteToast.description: The form and all its answers will be deleted as well.

templatePageResultsTab.title: Results
templatePageResultsTab.description: Filled out forms for this template.

deleteFormToast.title: Form is being deleted
deleteFormToast.description: The form and all its answers will be deleted.

deleteTemplateToast.title: Template is being deleted
deleteTemplateToast.description: All the forms filled with this template will be deleted as well.

newTemplateDialog.title: Let's create a new template
newTemplateDialog.description: Create a new template to share with the community.

successToast.title: Account created
successToast.description: Your account has been created successfully.

loginSchema.password: The password must be at least 6 characters

signupSchema.name: The name must be at least 1 character
signupSchema.lastName: The last name must be at least 1 character

newTemplateSchema.title: The title is required
newTemplateSchema.tags: At least one tag is required
newTemplateSchema.imageType: File must be an png, jpg or jepg image

integer.number: The value should be a number
integer.min: The value should be greater than or equal to 0

errors.general: An error occurred, please try again later

patchAnswerCodeMessage.400: Invalid data, please check the data for the answer edition

patchAnswerCodeMessage.403: You are not allowed to edit this answer
patchAnswerCodeMessage.404: The answer you are trying to edit does not exist
patchAnswerCodeMessage.422: You are trying to set values in the wrong type of question
patchAnswerCodeMessage.500: There was an error processing your request. Please try again later
